title: Custom Computer Tools Microblog
description: The microblog feed for customct.com. I talk about computer automation, and freelance programming.

items.content_html: I've totally redid my website using Svelte. You can see the changes at Custom Computer Tools. You can create your own using my template Svelte GitHub Website Template.
I just added a new section to my website: eLisp. This section is about my eLisp extensions for Emacs.
I just posted a new post on my website, Check it out!
Just moved my site to using Hexo and GitHub. Check it out!

I’ve heavily updated my fman plugin for working with Dropbox. You can now browse and download stuff from Dropbox server to your local file system. It’s running faster than most other solutions! Check it out: https://github.com/raguay/DropboxConnect
I’m really enjoying using TextBar. I’ve moved most of my BitBar scripts to it. Looking forward to playing with the HTML output!
@manton I'm seeing about 5 to 10 minute delay in posting.
@manton It still takes a while to show up on the stream. When I post to the ping address, my server is queried right away, but I don't see it in the feed for a while.
@manton I just figured that out. Right now I'm hand compiling the feed stream. Now that I've figured out the basics, I'm adding more funcitonality to create the stream. Thanks for the help.

@manton I built my own web server using golang. I'm trying to add microblogging to it. I'm trying to figure out the process. So, if the server pings 'http://micro.blog/raguay', it will update my feed?

items.content_text: Okay. It seems to work now. I had to change the feed type to json. How do you get it to update quicker?
@manton How do I see my posts from my server? Should they show up in the Micro.blog main feed? I can't tell it they are posted at all.
